question: some people thinks that development of technology is reducing crime while think that it encourages crime? discuss both the views.give your opinion?
text: These days, Some masses believe that crime is alleviated with the modern technology. While others believe that it is  raising with leading-edge technology. It has both positive and Negative factors that I will explain the successive paragraphs.

On the other side, crime rate is enhanced because folks are learning the numerous things from the programmes or movies which are telecasted on the electronic media such as internet, electronic gadgets et cetera.
